summary: Contoso Wireless offers a variety of downgrade services tailored to individual needs, including unlimited data and 500 minutes of talk time for $20 per month, and unlimited talk time and 1GB of data for $30 per month. Additional features such as international calling, text messaging, and data packages are available for an additional fee. There is a 20% discount available when signing up for a 12-month contract on either plan. Customers should read the Terms and Conditions before signing up, and can do so either online or in any of the retail stores.
